titles.title: Commending and congratulating the University of Connecticut men's basketball team, the UConn Huskies, for winning the 2024 National Collegiate Athletic Association Men's Basketball Championship, and commending and congratulating the University of Connecticut's women's basketball team for securing a place in the Final Four.

Commending and congratulating the University of Connecticut men's basketball team, the UConn Huskies, for winning the 2024 National Collegiate Athletic Association Men's Basketball Championship, and commending and congratulating the University of Connecticut's women's basketball team for securing a place in the Final Four.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary:
This resolution commends the University of Connecticut menâ€™s basketball team for winning the 2024 National Collegiate Athletic Association (NCAA) menâ€™s basketball championship.
The resolution also commends the University of Connecticut womenâ€™s basketball team for reaching the Final Four of the NCAA womenâ€™s basketball championship for the 23rd time in the program's history.
Further, the resolution congratulates Coach Geno Auriemma of the University of Connecticut womenâ€™s basketball team and Coach Dan Hurley of the men's team.
